options.name: Precise Throwing
options.description: Your Throwing Attacks with Weapons gain a +2 Bonus to their Attack Check.

options.name: Boomerang
options.description: When you throw a Light 1-Handed Weapon or Throwing Ammunition, it returns to your hand if the Attack hits.

options.name: Throwing Arm
options.description: You use your Athletics Modifier as the Attack Check for throwing Weapons, instead of the Weapon Skill Modifier.

options.name: Improved Throw
options.description: You can throw Heavy 1-Handed Weapons and gain +2 Range on all Throwing Attacks. Addtionally, gain +1 Athletics.

options.name: Action : Skillshot
options.description: Make a Throwing Weapon Attack or Throw a Small Object with no Penalty while throwing outside your Minimum or Maximum Range up to twice your Maximum Range, ignoring Partial Cover. The True Hit threshold on this Attack is increased by 2.

options.name: Action : Ricochet
options.description: Make a Throwing Weapon Attack and target an additional Creature within 2 units of your original target.

options.name: Reaction : Throwback
options.description: In response to being the single Target of a Projectile Attack, gain a 1d4 Bonus to your Defense Check. If you successfully Block or Dodge the Projectile, you can redirect it to a Target within your Throwing Range using your initial Defense Check as the Attack Check. If this Attack hits, it is upgraded to a True Hit.
